title: Drawing, Sketchbook Page: Three Landscapes after Vincenzo Martinelli. Verso: Architectural Sketch, 1811–14
title_raw: Sketchbook Page: Three Landscapes after Vincenzo Martinelli. Verso: Architectural Sketch
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three mountain landscapes, each with inscription: Martinelli Bologna. Verso: two capitals; thirteen moldings, coffer of ceiling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Sketchbook Page: Three Landscapes after Vincenzo Martinelli. Verso: Architectural Sketch, 1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2431
